comment_data.body:
I'd sure a PR to improve it would be welcome.

I'd think it's best not to clutter the interface of the `cython` command with too many different options, so maybe using CSS files would be best (possibly with a small standalone tool to generate a suitable CSS file?)? With that said, feel free to propose other reasonable options.

title: Annotate: change HTML appearance (dark theme or custom AnnotationCCodeWriter/CSS)
